title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Van Hiele Phase-Based Geometric Transformation Instructional Design Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geometric concepts (translation, rotation, symmetry, etc.) and coordinate system comprehension
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Logically explain properties of geometric transformations based on Van Hiele Levels 3-4 (analysis-deduction)
Reduce axis confusion errors by over 80% during coordinate system transformations and derive accurate results
Conceptually distinguish between translation/rotation transformations and apply them to real-world problems
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
